title: TraceBlock RPC call crashed the node
body:
#### System information

Geth version: master
CL client & version: e.g. lighthouse/nimbus/prysm@v1.0.0
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : develop
#### Expected behaviour
According to the geth implementation:
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/262bd38fce0317f0123947add02cbb3ccde75f59/rpc/service.go#L194-L203
The defer function would catch the panic and throw an internalServerError, without crashing node. 

#### Actual behaviour
Crash the node

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Listen to newHeads event, and call the `debug_traceBlock` immediately, after server blocks would crashes.

I check the node logs, and api like `debug_traceCall` failure can be handled as expected.
